医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
可持续战略将不当静脉注射的使用减少了三分之一由阿姆斯特丹 UMC 领导的研究，历时 5 年多，对 1100 名患者进行了研究，证明了一种可以将不适当的静脉注射使用量减少三分之一的策略，并且这种效果在五年期间持续存在。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240816/Sustainable-strategy-cuts-inproperty-IV-use-by-a-third.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240816/Sustainable-strategy-cuts-inproperty-IV-use-by-a-third.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1f90db4-7afe-4da5-bae1-0f744f696a64 Fri, 16 Aug 2024 23:40:00 -0400 Sustainable strategy cuts inappropriate IV use by a third
PINNACLE AI 模型推进现实世界中的蛋白质分析陆地上的鱼仍然会挥动鳍，但当鱼在水中时，结果明显不同。这个类比出自著名计算机科学家艾伦·凯之手，用于说明上下文在阐明正在研究的问题方面的力量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240816/PINNACLE-AI-model-advances- Protein-analysis-in-real-world-contexts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240816/PINNACLE-AI-model-advances- Protein-analysis-in-real-world-contexts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67b561e6-3296-4e28-94be-fe61a4c4a25e Fri, 16 Aug 2024 23:37:00 -0400 PINNACLE AI model advances protein analysis in real-world contexts
小鼠 ASTN2 基因敲除揭示了与自闭症相关的关键行为超过 70 个基因与自闭症谱系障碍 (ASD) 有关，这是一种发育性疾病，大脑的差异会导致一系列行为改变，包括语言、社交沟通、多动和重复运动方面的问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240816/ASTN2-gene-knockout-in-mice-reveals-key-autism-lated-behaviors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240816/ASTN2-gene-knockout-in-mice-reveals-key-autism-lated-behaviors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43be3a0e-6632-43ae-b7fc-0762a8818784 Fri, 16 Aug 2024 23:19:53 -0400 ASTN2 gene knockout in mice reveals key autism-related behaviors
对 COVID-19 刺突蛋白的新见解为通用疫苗带来了希望由莱斯大学的 Jose Onuchic 和东北大学的 Paul Whitford 领导的团队在对抗严重急性呼吸道疾病方面取得了一项发现，他们都是莱斯大学理论生物物理中心 (CTBP) 国家科学基金会物理前沿中心的研究人员冠状病毒 2 综合征 (SARS-CoV-2)，导致 COVID-19 的病毒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240816/New-insights-into-COVID-19-spike- Protein-offer-hope-for-universal-vaccines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240816/New-insights-into-COVID-19-spike- Protein-offer-hope-for-universal-vaccines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=408ac451-2a27-4541-b0fa-0ba0ef8a4218 Fri, 16 Aug 2024 23:12:46 -0400 New insights into COVID-19 spike protein offer hope for universal vaccines
研究发现美国与甲基苯丙胺相关的精神病住院人数不断增加《药物和酒精依赖》杂志上发表的一项新研究详细介绍了 2015 年至 2019 年间精神科住院治疗的趋势，发现虽然大多数住院治疗不涉及任何药物，但与甲基苯丙胺相关的住院治疗有所增加，而精神科住院治疗的总数保持稳定。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240816/Study-finds-rising-methamphetamine-lated-psychiatric-hospitalizations-in-the-US.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240816/Study-finds-rising-methamphetamine-lated-psychiatric-hospitalizations-in-the-US.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f94f6ee1-414b-43de-a9af-fa6e110d2ae1 Fri, 16 Aug 2024 22:59:21 -0400 Study finds rising methamphetamine-related psychiatric hospitalizations in the U.S.
科学家发现医院超级细菌如何迅速进化出对一线治疗的耐药性科学家们发现了医院超级细菌艰难梭菌如何迅速对英国用于治疗的一线药物产生耐药性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240816/Scientists-discover-how-hospital-superbug-rapidly-evolves-resistance-to-frontline-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240816/Scientists-discover-how-hospital-superbug-rapidly-evolves-resistance-to-frontline-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7eba3678-8c2d-4892-a716-7ab738b37027 Fri, 16 Aug 2024 11:23:00 -0400 Scientists discover how hospital superbug rapidly evolves resistance to frontline treatment
呼吸机相关肺炎的新模型揭示了改善治疗的途径 大学的科学家......华威大学的科学家取得了一项突破，可能有助于找到治疗致命感染的新疗法，这种感染可能影响多达 40% 使用机械呼吸机的医院患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240816/New-model-for-ventilator-linked-pneumonia-reveals-path-to-improved-treatments-Scientists-At-The-University.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240816/New-model-for-ventilator-linked-pneumonia-reveals-path-to-improved-treatments-Scientists-At-The-University.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a67cd241-77cd-4520-a5b7-865ad5e5a11a Fri, 16 Aug 2024 11:15:00 -0400 New model for ventilator-associated pneumonia reveals path to improved treatments Scientists At The University...
研究显示自闭症和智力障碍患者的围产期和产后风险较高在高收入国家中，美国妇女的孕产妇死亡率最高，少数群体的情况更糟。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240816/Study-reveals-higher-perinatal-postpartum-risks-for-individuals-with-autism-and-intellectual-disability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240816/Study-reveals-higher-perinatal-postpartum-risks-for-individuals-with-autism-and-intellectual-disability.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d58f4850-8bed-45f6-8c20-7599bf2f6f1d Fri, 16 Aug 2024 11:04:00 -0400 Study reveals higher perinatal, postpartum risks for individuals with autism and intellectual disabilities
新纳米抗体显示出预防乳腺肿瘤细胞肺转移的潜力2024 年 8 月 14 日，Oncotarget 第 15 卷发表了一篇新的研究论文，题为“A nanobody against the V-ATPase c subunit suggests metastasis of 4T1-12B乳腺癌细胞向小鼠肺部转移”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240816/New-nanobody-shows-potential-in-preventing-lung-metastasis-of-breast-tumor-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240816/New-nanobody-shows-pottial-in-preventing-lung-metastasis-of-breast-tumor-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f097197a-babd-4ce8-940a-4191ce87d825 Fri, 16 Aug 2024 10:56:00 -0400 New nanobody shows potential in preventing lung metastasis of breast tumor cells
揭示细菌细胞形状和潜在抗生素靶点背后的机制约翰霍普金斯大学医学院的研究人员研究了淡水湖和土壤中的细菌，他们称这是一个“令人惊讶”的发现，他们表示，他们已经确定了一种蛋白质在维持细菌形状方面的重要作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240816/Uncovering-the-mechanisms-behind-bacterial-cell-shape-and-pottial-antibiotic-targets.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240816/Uncovering-the-mechanisms-behind-bacterial-cell-shape-and-pottial-antibiotic-targets.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=88b013c2-db1c-4a95-858a-dc2e40022142 Fri, 16 Aug 2024 10:47:00 -0400 Uncovering the mechanisms behind bacterial cell shape and potential antibiotic targets
